an9.16:1.1: “Navayima, bhikkhave, sanna bhavita bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana.
an9.16:1.3: Asubhasanna, maranasanna, ahare patikulasanna, sabbaloke anabhiratasanna, aniccasanna, anicce dukkhasanna, dukkhe anattasanna, pahanasanna, viragasanna—
an9.16:1.4: ima kho, bhikkhave, nava sanna, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana”ti.
